name: Gravity Scramble
description:
Easy to learn, hard to master.

Scramble to be the best as you fall out of control through space. Pass through THE GATE, and bounce of ENTITIES to collect COINS, to increase you score.

Play for as long as you to find out if you're the best. Are you?

CONTROLS

ActionsControlsLookMouseCharge / DashLeft Click or Space then ReleasePauseEscape (during play)
